thread.title: PGIMER Recruitment 2017 – 100 Teaching & Non Teaching Posts
thread.title_full: PGIMER Recruitment 2017 – 100 Teaching & Non Teaching Posts

author: publisher12
title: PGIMER Recruitment 2017 – 100 Teaching & Non Teaching Posts
text: 27. CSIC: 01 Post 28. ENT(Research): 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be up to 50 years as on 28-02-2017. Age relaxation 05 years is applicable to SC/ ST, PWD, Government Servant, 03 years for OBC candidates & for more information refer the notification.   a medical qualification included in the first or second schedule or Part II of the third schedule to the Indian Medical Council Act of 1956, post graduation qualification i.e. MD (Anaesthesia) and/ or DM(Neuro-Anaesthesia) of Indian University/ Institute recognized by the Medical Council of an India or MCI recognized qualification equivalent thereto for teaching post, must be registered with State Medical Council/ MCI for Post A (1), medical qualification included in the first or second schedule or Part II of the third schedule to the Indian Medical Council Act of 1956, post graduation qualification i.e. MD (Biophysics) for Post A (2) & for   Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 1000/- (Rs. 500/- for SC/ ST candidates) for all others (non-refundable) in any branch of SBI through Challan duly filled in and pay the prescribed Application Fee in the “Power Jyoti” PUL current account of PGIMER (PGIMER Account No. 35700657347). No fee for PwD candidates.   application in the prescribed format along with copies of certificates duly attested by the Gazetted Officer in support of educational qualification(s), experience, age/ date of birth certificate, caste certificate, No Objection Certificate from the present employer, if employed & one copy of challan form should be sent through registered post or Speed Post or personally only to the Assistant Administrative Officer (Recruitment Cell), PGIMER, Sector-12, Chandigarh 160012 on or before 28-  & Payment of Fee in the Bank: 28-02-2017. Challan form of application form will be available on PGI Website: 31-01-2017 to 25-02-2017 (23.59 hrs).   vacancy details & other
